______________OBJECTIVE__________________
Bringing solutions and exploiting new and innovative ideas in the most competitive environment, managing
team works in different cultures, and implementing an impressive & optimal results in High - growth
Environments.
CURRENT COMPANY  :-  ANI INSTRUMENTS PVT. LTD 22ND AUGUST 2016 TO TILL DATE
Presently  working as a Field Engineer at HINDUSTAN PETROLEUM CORPORATION LIMITED (HPCL)
Jodhpur, Rajasthan through ANI Instruments Pvt. Ltd.
Roles and Responsibilities :- 
Handling all the activities of Oil in the Gantry.
Sound knowledge of calibration of TT’s & Safety check of TT’s.
Gauging of Oil Tanks.
Checking of quality parameters of products in line with IQCM.
Sound knowledge of effluent treatment plant(ETP).
To ensure safe operation along with the Plant safety.
Understanding  of  all  aspects  governing  operational  and  production  activities  and  up  to  date  knowledge  of  latest
technological advancements, regulations/guidelines and statutory compliances in the industry.
Knowledge of Tank line up.
Handled Control Room all Shift activities and Operations.
Supervising Maintenance and Operations.
Maintenance of Motor Operated Valves & Hand Operated valves for any kind of leakages of all kinds of petroleum
products.
Ability to use sound judgment & decision-making skills and effectively perform in a self-directed environment.
Key Learning and Achievements.
Maintaining history of equipment/machinery and Preventive Maintenance schedule according to ISO formats.
Ability to handle Multi product filling Operations.
Operation of Pumps according to SOP.
Training programs to Workmen at regular intervals.
Monitoring Oil movement, storage & operations.
Knowledge of Oil Industry Safety Directorate (OISD) codes.
Monitoring of SCADA systems for smooth working of different parameters related to Pressure, Temperature & Flow etc.
Monthly Inspection of Fire Engines & Fire water tanks, Tank Truck Gantry, Motor control centre/ Switch Yards/
Transformer, Product loading / Unloading Pump House / Manifold, ETP & OWS, Product Tank & Tank farm area as per M
& I.
Weekly Inspection of floating Roof tanks.
Check Daily checklist for fire engine & Pump. Present Address:
 H.No k-66, Amar Colony Nangloi Delhi-110041  Manoj Kumar Bhardwaj
   B.Tech Mechanical Engineering
          Contact No.   :  +91-9540837526,
                               +91-9136324085
           E-mail           :-   mkbhardwaj90@gmail.com
     Total Experience  : Dynamic and detailed – oriented Mechanical Engineer, with a
versatile 
                                           Experience of 2  years across Oil & Gas field. 
       Industry Preferred    : Oil and Gas, Automobile
1Update Form Inventory data.
Prepare Preventive Maintenance check list for transformer, Fire water Pump, DG set 625 KVA & 225 KVA.
Daily safety inspection as per OISD – 244.
 
PREVIOUS WORK EXPERIENCE (1.8 YEARS) :-
Company Name :  Kosan Crisplant India Pvt. Ltd C/O Hindustan Petroleum Corporation Ltd.
Designation       :  Operation Officer
Period               :  Sept 2014 to April 2016
Description        : The Kosan Crisplant Group introduced a new dynamic processing technology called 
                           Flexspeed in 2008, a technology that has now been refined even more. It having 72
                                 filling machine in one carousel with the capacity of 4200 cyl/hr. It contains three equipment
                                 i.e vision unit, GD/PT. Vision unit used for capturing the tare weight. GD/PT used for  
                                 leakage testing. All machines are connected with the same shaft & its Speed is controlled
                                 by VFD’S. All carousel machine are fully synchronized, machine having own controller for
                                 power and communication purpose.
Roles and Responsibilities :-
Led the LPG Operation.
Handled the Production activities. 
Accountable for increasing production with safety initiatives.
Meeting various targets – Tank Truck (TT) Loading operations to other OMC Locations including HPCL plants.
LPG bottling operations, TT loading operations using (TAS).
Minimize the stock losses while PLT Transfer, LPG Bottling, TT loading and TW Loading.
Provided work related training to newly inducted workers.
Experience in handling basic troubleshooting of Terminal Automation System.
Achieved 100% loading operation through TAS.
Worked in field as well as control room for monitor/supervision.
Follow preventive maintenance routine, decrease downtime/analysis of failure.
Independently handling of terminal operations.
Knowledge of PLT Transfer.
Knowledge of LPG TT Loading and Carousel also.
Monitoring of Operations i.e (TAS Troubleshooting, DPT operation, Pump house operation, Bottling operation, TT 
   loading operation, Weighbridge operation).
Maintaining healthy & cordial relationships with the employee for expanding production.
Mentoring, training and more importantly, leading field functionaries to ensure operation efficiency.
Creating and sustaining a dynamic environment that fosters the development opportunities and motivates high    
    performance amongst the team.
Daily Reports (Productivity reports, Cap shorts reports, PRCN reports, Stock card, Cylinders dispatch report).
